inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Poorly controlled high blood pressure (SBP ≥160 mmHg or DBP ≥ 100 mmHg)

exclusion.criterion: Screening Vitamin D (D2 and D3 level) < 5 or > 25 ng/ml

exclusion.criterion: History of kidney stones (less than one year prior to screening)
